alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:16AM CDT until June 18 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 116 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Scraper to 5 miles west of Marble City, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Stilwell... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... Winslow... Chester... Adair State Park... Christie... Cincinnati... Blackburn... Maryetta... Lee Creek... Bunch... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 31 and 64. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
